Section.Name: Session
Section.Description: Session level messages to establish and control a FIX session

Section.Name: PreTrade
Section.Description: Pre trade messages including reference data, market data, quoting, news and email, indication of interest

Section.Name: PostTrade
Section.Description: Post trade messages including trade reporting, allocation, collateral, confirmation, position mantemenance, registration instruction, and settlement instructions
